message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I believe this price reflects its value, and I'm confident you'll find it a great investment. What do you think?

I'm interested in the product, but I think $1500000 is a bit steep. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I need to make a bit more to meet my expectations. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $1350000. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to negotiating further if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1350000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1250000. Can you consider this revised offer?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not quite there yet. I'm willing to make another concession, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $1300000. This is my next best offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1300000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1200000, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this revised offer?
